Name: Drift City Underground
About the game: Drift City is an Open World Driving Drifting Sim with Deep Car Customization such as Speed, Suspension, different driving system and styles and much more which you can read down below. There are 8 cars that can be unlocked for the Early Access and we will add at least 20 cars to the game. It has 6 different cameras/views to see the car and play. There are also Slowmotion and Nitro for all cars available. It has a minimap so you can see where you go and what you will face and amazing music that can be muted if you wish. More in detail down below. Customization Suspension ========= Front Suspension Spring Force Front Suspension Spring Damp Rear Suspension Spring Force Rear Suspension Spring Damp Front Camber Rear Camber Front Suspension Rear Suspension Electronic Systems =============== ABS, ESP, TCS, SH Driving Styles =========== Simulator, Racing, Drift, Semi Arcade, Fun Colors ===== Headlight Colors, Wheel Smoke Colors Driving Customization ================= Maximum Speed Maximum Brake Maximum Torque, Turbo, Exhaust Flame, Rev Limiter, Auto Transmission RWD FWD ADW, Clutch Threshold, Gear Shifting Threshold.
